餤餤餤

餤字的基本解释

餤
dàn
饼：“腊日造脂花餤。”
古同“啖”：“食尽，餤尸以战。”

餤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tán］
［《廣韻》徒甘切，平談，定。］
(1)进食。
(2)引申为增多或加多。
[②]［dàn］
［《集韻》徒濫切，去闞，定。］
(1)同“啗”。吃。
(2)引诱。
(3)有馅的饼。
(4)切碎似馅之食物。

餤字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　餤； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1422第05
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?徒甘切，音談。【玉篇】進也。【詩·小雅】盜言孔甘，亂是用餤。【傳】餤，進也。【釋文】餤，沈旋音談。　又【集韻】【韻會】余廉切【正韻】移廉切，?音鹽。義同。【詩·小雅】亂是用餤。徐邈讀。又【廣韻】【集韻】?杜覽切，音?。同啖。【說文】噍啖也。【集韻】或作啗嚪噉。　又【六書故】今以薄餠卷肉，切而薦之曰餤。【正字通】唐賜進士，有紅綾餤，南唐有玲瓏餤，駝蹄餤，鷺鷥餤，皆餠也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?徒濫切，音淡。亦噉也，食也。　又餌之也。【史記·趙世家】故以齊餤天下。

餤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
餤字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
advance
dàn
Biscuit: "Lari makes fat glutinous rice cakes."
Gu Tong "chee": "If you eat up, you can fight with the corpse."
advance
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tán］
["Guangyun" is only for Ganqi, flat talk, set. ]
(1) Eat.
(2) The extension is to increase or increase.
[②]［dàn］
["Jiyun" cut indiscriminately, go to Kan, set. ]
(1) Same as "啖". eat.
(2) Seduction.
(3) Pies with fillings.
(4) Chopped up food that resembles stuffing.
advance
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Shizi Department】　餤; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1422 No. 05
[Guangyun] [Jiyun] [Rhyme]? Tu Ganqie, talk about it. [Jade articles] Into also. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Telling Kong Gan, chaos is the use of food. 【Biography】Tian, Jin Ye. 【Explanation】Ting, Shen Xuanyintan.　 [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Yu Lianqie [Zheng Yun] Move Lianqie,? Yinyan. The same meaning. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Chaos is to use food. Xu Miao reads. And [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Du Lanqie, sound?. The same. [Said the text] 噍啖也. [Ji Yun] Or make a cry.　[Six Books] Nowadays, the meat is rolled with thin glutinous rice, cut and recommended to be called glutinous rice. [Zhengzitong] Tang gave Jinshi, there are red silky ties, Southern Tang has exquisite ties, camel hoof ties, heron ties, all are too.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun] again? I just cut it indiscriminately, and the sound is weak. Eat too, eat too.　It's also bait. [Historical Records·Zhao Family] Therefore, the whole world is in harmony.

Name meaning

dàn, tán
I dàn сущ.
блины с мясным фаршем
II гл.
1) dàn * приманивать, соблазнять приманкой
2) tán * расти, нарастать, набираться сил
盗言孔甘乱是用餤 очень уж сладки разбойные речи, смута от них набирается сил...
